name: Anastasia Kurova
about:
I am a Frontend-developer with more than 4 years of experience.
I enjoy
developing beautiful and convenient web interfaces, be a part of the
developing process and see results of my work. I am interested in
new technologies and how to use them. I worked on an AngularJs
project with Node.js backend, then I refactored it to a React
application with stack TypeScript, React, Redux toolkit, Jest, React
Testing Library. I developed projects from start and wrote libs for
them. Worked with IndexedDB and WebSocket. Wrote unit and
component tests. Also, marked up websites and landings. I think it is
important to write understandable and simple code. 
My main stack: JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux, Jest, CSS,
HTML, Node.js
I am searching for a remote work with possibility of relocation to
other countries.
workKoshelekDuty1: Creation, development, engineering of web applications
workKoshelekDuty2: Creation, development, engineering of web libs
workKoshelekDuty6: Support for the codebase of projects
workKoshelekDuty8: Markup and development of landing pages and websites
EducationTechUniM: Saint Petersburg State University of Aerospace Instrumentation
EducationTechUniMProf: Master's degree, Computer Technologies and Software Engineering
EducationTechUniBProf: Bachelor degree, Computer Technologies and Software Engineering
EducationTechUniBDo: Activity: trade union committee, speeches at scientific conferences
